item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series! This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

EMERGENCY VENUE CHANGE!Â  CONGRESS TAVERN!

Wow, I hosted at Ladder 133 back on August 15th, 2011, but thanks to Linda (hat's off) apparently Ladder 133 is not open on Mondays for this summer! Oh well...

After some sleuthing back on past MNM's, we haven't been to Congress Tavern in quite some time. So let's go!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing Penn State attire
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - EMERGENCY VENUE CHANGE - Congress Tavern
